Kukakaka...\""},{"lineNumber":226375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「足りん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not enough..."},{"lineNumber":226376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　足りんなぁぁぁぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Not enough at alllll...\""},

{"lineNumber":226377,"originalJapaneseLine":"片腕を奪われて尚、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even after losing an arm,"},

{"lineNumber":226378,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、むしろそれまでよりも更にひどく、","translatedEnglishLine":"no, rather, even more severely than before,"},

{"lineNumber":226379,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就は残忍に笑む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Motoyasu smiled cruelly."},

{"lineNumber":226380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレを殺したいなら！！！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you want to kill me!!!!"},

{"lineNumber":226381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　百倍の魔物は連れてこい！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Bring a hundred times more monsters!!!!\""},

{"lineNumber":226382,"originalJapaneseLine":"心の臓を抉るような元就の怒号に森の木々が揺れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The trees in the forest shook at Motoyasu's roar that seemed to gouge out hearts."},

{"lineNumber":226383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの馬鹿、防御を考えねぇからああなるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That idiot gets like that because he never thinks about defense.\""},{"lineNumber":226384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、ああいう戦い方をするなと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously, we keep telling him not to fight like that,"},

{"lineNumber":226385,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言っているのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but he doesn't listen...\""},

{"lineNumber":226386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょちょ、呑気に見てる場合かよ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, is this the time to be watching so casually!?"},

{"lineNumber":226387,"originalJapaneseLine":"　腕が取られちまったんだぞ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"His arm got taken off, you know!?\""},{"lineNumber":226388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それならほっとけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then just leave him be.\""},{"lineNumber":226389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつは昔、妖怪の呪いを受けてな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That guy was cursed by a yokai long ago."},{"lineNumber":226390,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ以来、不死になったんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then, he became immortal.\""},{"lineNumber":226391,"originalJapaneseLine":"「傷や骨折、切断に至っても綺麗に治るそうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I hear that wounds, fractures, and even severed limbs heal perfectly."},{"lineNumber":226392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　痛みまでは消せないけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the pain doesn't go away.\""},{"lineNumber":226393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのせいで毛利家の気風も合わさり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because of that, combined with the spirit of the Mouri family,"},{"lineNumber":226394,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああいう無茶な戦闘を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he fights recklessly like that...\""},

{"lineNumber":226395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でもさ、ピンチっぽいし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but, he looks like he's in a pinch, so,"},

{"lineNumber":226396,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺達も助けに入った方が――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we should also join to help—!\""},{"lineNumber":226397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よしなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop it.\""},{"lineNumber":226398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーそー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah."},{"lineNumber":226399,"originalJapaneseLine":"　下手に間に入るとこっちまで殺されちゃうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you recklessly get involved, we'll end up getting killed too.\""},{"lineNumber":226400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ハラハラするなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... this is nerve-wracking...\""},{"lineNumber":226401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッ、だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, but..."},{"lineNumber":226402,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ待ってるだけってのも馬鹿馬鹿しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"just sitting around waiting is pointless.\""},{"lineNumber":226403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちと、行ってくらぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll be going then.\""},{"lineNumber":226404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ちょっと！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait a minute!\""},{"lineNumber":226405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アァン！？　なに馬鹿やってやがんだテメー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aahn!? What the hell are you doing, you idiot!"},{"lineNumber":226406,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははははははははは！　その喧嘩混ぜろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha! Let me join that fight!\""},{"lineNumber":226407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、ザンスか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what the hell!\""},{"lineNumber":226408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ククク、いいだろう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kukuku, fine by me!"},{"lineNumber":226409,"originalJapaneseLine":"　退屈していたところだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was getting bored anyway!\""},{"lineNumber":226410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くたばれぇぇぇえええーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Drop deadddd!ーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":226411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「フンッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph!\""},{"lineNumber":226412,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な刀を振りかぶり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Raising his huge sword,"},

{"lineNumber":226413,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就はそれを思い切りザンスに打ち付けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Motoyasu swung it with all his might at Zansu."},

{"lineNumber":226414,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ、加勢に行ったのに攻撃された！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh, I got attacked even though I went to help!?\""},{"lineNumber":226415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの状態になってる元就に近づけば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you get close to Motoyasu in that state,"},{"lineNumber":226416,"originalJapaneseLine":"　味方であろうと攻撃されるさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"he'll attack you even if you're an ally.\""},{"lineNumber":226417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毛利元就……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mouri Motoyasu..."},{"lineNumber":226418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見た通りの危険な子だから気をつけるんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's as dangerous as he looks, so be careful.\""},{"lineNumber":226419,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":226420,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":226421,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘はあっという間に終わり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle ended in the blink of an eye,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「猛獣かなんかなの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it some kind of wild beast!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、猛獣。
まさしくそんな感じだね、元就は」
「ええっ！？」
「あ、片腕持ってかれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, his one arm got taken off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっがあああああああああ！」
元就に視線を向ければ、
魔物の攻撃により元就の片腕が千切り落とされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of Motoyasu's arms had been torn off by a monster's attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宙をクルクルと舞っていた。
気づけば元就を囲む魔物の数は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, the number of monsters surrounding Motoyasu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆうに百を越えていた。
「ククク……クカカカ……」
「足りん……
足りんなぁぁぁぁ……」
片腕を奪われて尚、
いや、むしろそれまでよりも更にひどく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no, rather, even more severely than before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就は残忍に笑む。
「オレを殺したいなら！！！！
百倍の魔物は連れてこい！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bring a hundred times more monsters!!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の臓を抉るような元就の怒号に森の木々が揺れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The trees in the forest shook at Motoyasu's roar that seemed to gouge out hearts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの馬鹿、防御を考えねぇからああなるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That idiot gets like that because he never thinks about defense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、ああいう戦い方をするなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, we keep telling him not to fight like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言っているのに……」
「ちょちょ、呑気に見てる場合かよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait, is this the time to be watching so casually!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腕が取られちまったんだぞ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His arm got taken off, you know!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それならほっとけ」
「あいつは昔、妖怪の呪いを受けてな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy was cursed by a yokai long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以来、不死になったんだ」
「傷や骨折、切断に至っても綺麗に治るそうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hear that wounds, fractures, and even severed limbs heal perfectly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛みまでは消せないけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the pain doesn't go away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのせいで毛利家の気風も合わさり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that, combined with the spirit of the Mouri family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいう無茶な戦闘を……」
「で、でもさ、ピンチっぽいし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but, he looks like he's in a pinch, so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達も助けに入った方が――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we should also join to help—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしなさい」
「そーそー。
下手に間に入るとこっちまで殺されちゃうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you recklessly get involved, we'll end up getting killed too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……ハラハラするなぁ……」
「ケッ、だが……
ただ待ってるだけってのも馬鹿馬鹿しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just sitting around waiting is pointless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちと、行ってくらぁ」
「あ、ちょっと！」
「アァン！？　なに馬鹿やってやがんだテメー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aahn!? What the hell are you doing, you idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははははは！　その喧嘩混ぜろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha! Let me join that fight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、ザンスか！」
「ククク、いいだろう！
退屈していたところだ！」
「くたばれぇぇぇえええーーーー！」
「フンッ！」
巨大な刀を振りかぶり、
元就はそれを思い切りザンスに打ち付けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motoyasu swung it with all his might at Zansu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええっ、加勢に行ったのに攻撃された！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, I got attacked even though I went to help!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの状態になってる元就に近づけば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you get close to Motoyasu in that state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方であろうと攻撃されるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he'll attack you even if you're an ally."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛利元就……
見た通りの危険な子だから気をつけるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's as dangerous as he looks, so be careful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘はあっという間に終わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ended in the blink of an eye,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達も助けに入った方が――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we should also join to help—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしなさい」
「そーそー。
下手に間に入るとこっちまで殺されちゃうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you recklessly get involved, we'll end up getting killed too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……ハラハラするなぁ……」
「ケッ、だが……
ただ待ってるだけってのも馬鹿馬鹿しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just sitting around waiting is pointless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちと、行ってくらぁ」
「あ、ちょっと！」
「アァン！？　なに馬鹿やってやがんだテメー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aahn!? What the hell are you doing, you idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははははは！　その喧嘩混ぜろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha! Let me join that fight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、ザンスか！」
「ククク、いいだろう！
退屈していたところだ！」
「くたばれぇぇぇえええーーーー！」
「フンッ！」
巨大な刀を振りかぶり、
元就はそれを思い切りザンスに打ち付けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motoyasu swung it with all his might at Zansu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええっ、加勢に行ったのに攻撃された！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, I got attacked even though I went to help!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの状態になってる元就に近づけば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you get close to Motoyasu in that state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方であろうと攻撃されるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he'll attack you even if you're an ally."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛利元就……
見た通りの危険な子だから気をつけるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's as dangerous as he looks, so be careful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘はあっという間に終わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ended in the blink of an eye,
